General.Name: Shanghai Safbon Water Service
General.Description: SafBon Water Service (Holding) Inc.,Shanghai provides water treatment services in China. The company offers industrial waste water treatment solutions, including lime technology for reclaimed water treatment, membrane bio-reactor technology for reclaimed water treatment, flue gas desulfurization wastewater treatment, zero liquid discharge, and oily water separation technology; municipal water treatment solutions comprising drinking water purification systems and processes, BIOBON process with biological suspending chain aeration system, precoat filtration technology, low impact development system, and sewage treatment for municipal waste water; and membrane and ion exchange solutions, including hi-tower regeneration, power coated, and demineralized water treatment technology. It also provides solid waste treatment solutions, such as hazardous incineration, and the thin film sludge dryer technology; seawater desalination solutions comprising membrane and containerized desalination technology; compressed natural gas (CNG)/liquefied natural gas (LNG) filling stations, LNG gasification stations, natural gas regulation stations, and long distance gas pipelines, as well as combined cooling, heating, and power systems; and sea water flue gas desulfurization technology. In addition, the company offers ceramic flat membrane systems, which removes pollutants like particles and microorganisms and produces clear water free from biological and toxic hazards; and dissolved air flotation systems that treats water and waste water. SafBon Water Service (Holding) Inc.,Shanghai is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
